root.name: Modern War: Somalian Pirates
root.description: The player escorts a variety of civilian ships by either helicopter or by boat. The one and only objective is to use a Gatling gun to destroy small boats filled with Somali pirates armed with automatic rifles and RPG launchers.PC System RequirementsMinimum System Requirements:System: Windows XP/Vista/7Processor: Pentium IV 2.5 GHzMemory: 1 GB RAMVideo: 256 MB GeForce 6600 or Radeon X1300Sound: DirectX Compatible SoundcardHard disk: 2 GB
